entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
